__e: There was money in it, and a cash book with my name.
So, after school, maybe we'll, uh... We'll stop by the art store and get you a new sketchbook and, um, some of those...
Haven't you a note book with a list of things to be done?
The earliest present I remember receiving was on my fifth birthday. A neighbor girl---who was about ten---gave me a notebook and pen (or perhaps it was a pencil). I was...
I told him I'd forgotten my rate book and needed some dope... on the public liability bond I was figuring.
You just take the notebook and get to safety.
Here is your toast, and be careful not to stain your notebook with it.
This notebook, which I thought that I had lost... was actually in the pocket of my cape all the time.
May I have the notebook which is in your pocket?
Would you kindly fetch my notebook from the workroom?
